jtorrent.client

Class LeecherHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • jtorrent.client.LeecherHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LeecherHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread that requests file chunks from seeding peers on the network. Uses an executor to process incoming file chunks in parallel.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  LeecherHandler.LeecherTask
      Private Runnable that makes a request to a seeding peer and writes the response data to the file.
